{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = 4T4R 802.11ac WiFi 2.4/5GHz Dual Band Mini PCIe Module |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asiarf.com/Mediatek-MT7615-4x4-4T4R-802-11ac-a-b-g-n-WiFi-Mini-PCIe-Module-2-4---5GHz-dual-bands-WS3294-product-view-397.html |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = AsiaRF_WS3294 |wikipedia = |brand = AsiaRF |model = WS3294 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/22/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/AsiaRF_WS3294 |sernum = |wlclass = AC2400 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = module (oversized) |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615E; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 4 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1733 |nqam = |802.11n = 600 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = MU-MIMO, Wave2, VHT160 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/07/2016 |estreldate = 07/2016 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Features=== *Embedded ARM Cortex R4 processor for full host CPU offload :Highly integrated RF with 40nm low power process :Embedded 32-bit RISC microprocessor :iNIC Gen2 with full Wi-Fi offload *Supports 4x4:4SS 802.11ac Wave 2 MU-MIMO and 160MHz channels :MU-MIMO configurations of 4 users: 4x :1SS :3 users: 2x :1SS + 1x :2SS or 3x :1SS :2 users: 2x :2SS or 1x :1SS + 1x :2SS or 2x :1SS *Supports 5, 10, 20, 40, 80, 80 + 80 and 160MHz channels :4T4R with support of up to 1733Mbps PHY rate :Configurable 4x4/3x3 or 2x2n + 2x2ac DBDC *Intelligent power saving, Noise mitigation: :Supports background scan function for fast channel switching :Supports spectrum analysis for non-Wi-Fi signals *Hardware-based Airtime Fairness (QoS) *Integrate high efficiency internal 2.4/5GHz PA's *Intelligent Calibration (iCal) reduces the production time *Supports external PA/LNA/TRSW design *Proprietary LTE coexistence over UART *WoWLAN via GPIO (client mode), supports Host Sleep (AP mode) *Compact 12x12mm DRQFN118 package with PCIe Gen2 interface ===Specifications=== 
*Standards: Wireless: 802.11abgn/ac (4T4R)

*Data Rate:
:802.11ac 1733Mbps TX/RX
:802.11a/n 600Mbps TX/RX
:802.11a/g 108Mbps TX/RX
:802.11b 22Mbps TX/RX

*Output Power:
11a: 16dBm ±1.5dbm 54Mbps
11b: 20dbm ±1.5dbm 11Mbps
11g: 18dbm ±1.5dbm 54Mbps
11g/n: 18dBm ±1.5dbm (MCS7,HT20), 17dBm (MCS7,HT40)
11a/n: 15dBm ±1.5dbm (MCS7,HT20), 13dBm (MCS7,HT40)
11ac HT20: 12dBm ±1.5dBm MCS8
11ac HT40: 12dBm ±1.5dBm MCS9
11ac HT80: 12dBm ±1.5dBm MCS9

*Receiver Sensitivity:
11a: -75Bm 54Mbps
11b: -89dBm 11Mbps
11g: -76dBm 54Mbps
11g/n: -74dBm (HT20,MCS7), -66dBm (HT40,MCS7)
11a/n: -73dBm (HT20,MCS7), -71dBm (HT40,MCS7)
11ac: -57dBm ±2dBm (HT20,MCS8)
11ac: -54dBm ±2dBm (HT40,MCS9)
11ac: -51dBm ±2dBm (HT80,MCS9)

*Antenna: Internal Chip Antenna /
:External Antenna connector (IPEX)

*Frequency Range: 5.15~5.875 GHz
US, Canada: 2.412~2.462 GHz (CH1~CH11)
EU, Japan: 2.412~2.472 GHz (CH1~CH13)

*Software: Driver: Linux
:Security: 64/128-bit WEP Encryption, WPA, WPA2
*Operating Voltage: DC 3.3V ±5%
[[Category:English Documentation]]
